name: ZOMBIE ZONE (Dadespeciale)
description:
zombie zone is a simple arcade game in which you have to destroy as many zombies as possible

    BEWARE YOU HAVE SHOTS

THE SHOTS ARE FEW INSURED UNTIL YOU HAVE THEM AT HAND, OR IF THEY FINISHED GO TO THE REFILL AIR: IN A FEW WORDS WHERE YOU SEE THE SHOTS APPEAR

  RUN

try not to touch the zombies and not to be touched or you will lose a heart, well if you lose them all game over, fifth I recommend not to touch the zombies

community

if you find any bugs you can write it in the comments, then I will try to improve it or: leave it like this

                  have fun
